childMarkdownRemark.html: The minimalist black and white line drawing of a single peony in full bloom has been realized, perfectly aligning with the described style. It features distinct, elegant petals and a straight stem with two leaves, depicted in a style that resonates with classic botanical illustrations. This artwork, marked by its clean, simple lines without shading, is crafted to impart a sense of calm and elegance.
